channel.title: World of Warcraft now free to play
channel.description:
up to level 20, and vanilla and bc where merged together for free
thoughts on the game or the news in general?

item.source: World of Warcraft now free to play

item.title: World of Warcraft now free to play
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:23, topic:401641”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=498702.msg3648083#msg3648083 date=1309536976]

Personally, i’ve played this game for probably 2 years now. I started up with some mates which made it more enjoyable. When i started a trial i only got 10 days to get to lvl 20, mind you it was harder to get to 20 then.
[/quote]Yup, game’s too easy now with heirlooms able to get you ~50% more experience gain.

I’m finding it less and less enjoyable, myself. I’m playing RIFT and awaiting Trion World’s Defiance to hopefully make me content once again.

Since Cata came out it has become less enjoyable.

Alot of people say this, how?[/quote]It’s just… bland. They’ve gotten better at quest ideas to where it actually follows a story and there’s quests that stray from the normal “kill this, gather this”; but at end-game it now has even more of a repetitive feel to it than ever to me. There’s only TWO instances to do for the top heroic gear now, both being troll-based.

Read full topic

What year did you start playing RuneScape?
[/quote]
Since it was released back in 2005[/quote]

Point being that he found RuneScape remotely enjoyable at one point. The graphics for RuneScape have always been garbage and will continue being garbage until the game dies.

item.title: World of Warcraft now free to play
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:23, topic:401641”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=498702.msg3648083#msg3648083 date=1309536976]

Personally, i’ve played this game for probably 2 years now. I started up with some mates which made it more enjoyable. When i started a trial i only got 10 days to get to lvl 20, mind you it was harder to get to 20 then.
[/quote]Yup, game’s too easy now with heirlooms able to get you ~50% more experience gain.

I’m finding it less and less enjoyable, myself. I’m playing RIFT and awaiting Trion World’s Defiance to hopefully make me content once again.

Since Cata came out it has become less enjoyable.

Alot of people say this, how?[/quote]
They tried to make it more like Vanilla but they failed. People hyped Cata up too much so when it was released it was disappointing. Also they stuffed a lot of classes and roles around. All in all they just made the playing experience boring, maybe if they did some things different it could of turned out better.

Read full topic

item.source: World of Warcraft now free to play

item.title: World of Warcraft now free to play
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:4, topic:401641”][quote author=Frell link=topic=498702.msg3646795#msg3646795 date=1309449184]
shitty but still pretty fun. I dont no life it but I enjoy raids and pvp and thats about it. I mainly play it to immerse myself in the world, alot of inspiration for their art.
[/quote]Immersiveness and arcade gameplay doesn’t really match up very well when nearly everything is static and predictable.[/quote]
Everything is predictable, by immerse I meant the game world and technology are so unique that its gives you a backstory and helps me create art.

Andrew Ferguson:

I bought one month membership and honestly it was the worst game I have played that I had to pay for, it’s just repetitive tasks and quests over and over and the graphics aren’t high enough to make that remotely enjoyable.

THIS is how it was when I played on a private server, because it took forever for bgs to start and dunegons didnt work. I switched to retail for cataclysm and I only had to do quests up to 15, the rest was dungeons and pvp which I get a kick out of. Sadly I would like to ditch WoW for a better mmorpg I could spend time on, but I haven’t found any able to fill that void.

By the way, anyone looking for a good private server check out my video for bloodcraft, full guide in the description on how to play:

Read full topic

That’s what I mean.
